name: Dance Waifu
description:
Dance Waifu - a game about a cool party. On the dance floor gathered the most beautiful waifu and you have to find all the music records to make the music louder and waifu danced to distraction. The hotter the music, the less extra clothes will remain on the girls.

Key Features


  • Night club atmosphere
  • Upbeat music
  • Beautiful waifu!
